functions.description: Convert the given currency to AUD at the given time/date.
functions.name: CONVERT

parameters.description: The amount of the currency to convert
parameters.name: amount

functions.description: Extract the amount of a currency from a string. e.g. 4000AUD becomes 4000.
functions.name: EXTRACT_AMOUNT

functions.description: Extract the currency from a string. e.g. 4000AUD becomes AUD.
functions.name: EXTRACT_CURRENCY
